app.title: FitPlate
app.description: Your healthy meal prep and delivery solution

home.heroSubtitle: Start your healthy lifestyle journey with personalized meal plans, professional kitchen preparation, and convenient delivery right to your door
home.feature1Desc: Customized meal plans tailored to your fitness goals, activity level, and dietary preferences
home.feature2Desc: Gourmet meals prepared by expert chefs using the freshest, highest-quality ingredients
home.feature3Desc: Fresh meals delivered to your home or office whenever you need them. No cooking required!
home.feature4Desc: Track every calorie and macronutrient with detailed nutrition info for complete diet control

home.testimonial2: "The convenience and quality are unmatched. Best decision I made for my health!"
